description: This file defines a Python script that sets up a financial analysis agent with memory capabilities, including configuration, dependencies, and a web app interface for interaction.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured for financial analysis with memory and tools.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles the memory component for the agent, including database storage.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Provides a web interface for interacting with the agent.

methods.name: serve_playground_app
methods.description: Starts the web server for the playground interface.
